title: UFYB 79: Attachment Styles and Personality Tests
itunes:title: Attachment Styles and Personality Tests
description:
There is a downside to categorizing ourselves by personality tests and attachment styles. Before we learn to manage our thoughts and choose them on purpose, having a diagnostic of those thoughts can have a detrimental effect on our belief in our ability to change. 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/79

Join The Clutch today for a community of like-minded feminists: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/theclutch/

itunes:subtitle: The issue I see with identifying too strongly as a certain personality or attachment type.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
